tag_list: tenant, txt, contact-tenants, text-message, twitter, email, office-reminders, maintenance-alerts, tenants
overview:
I have 10+ solid years of computer related experience. From building PC’s from scratch to designing user friendly and innovative websites. I have never looked at dealing with computers as a job or a hassle. I enjoy mastering and implementing the latest technologies for the benefit of my clients, their customers and myself.

My latest venture is “Tenant Txt” it is a website that apt. mgmt or safety leaders can use to alert their community by text, email and Twitter. It’s as easy as sending one email. To learn more search “Tenant Txt” in any major search engine.
